dct_title_s: This map of the city of New York and island of Manhattan : as laid out by the commissioners appointed by the Legislature, April 3d. 1807 is respectfully dedicated to the mayor, aldermen and commonnalty thereof
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. "Reduced to 1/2 scale and lith. by G. Hayward for D.T. Valentine's manual, 1853." Oriented with north toward upper right corner.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York : Common Council, 1853] ([New York] : G. Hayward).
